name: lazymention
description: Support WebSub and Webmention on a static site

scripts.test: npm run build && nyc -r lcov -r text perjury test/*-test.js
scripts.test:install:local: REPO=$(pwd); cd $(mktemp -d); npm install $REPO perjury@1 express@4 bunyan@1 && sed -e "s;'\.\./lib/app';'lazymention';" -e "s;'\.\./lib/persistence');'lazymention').persistence;" -e 's/app module test/local require() test/' -e "s;'express';'lazymention/node_modules/express';" $REPO/test/app-test.js > install-test.js && cp -r $REPO/test/lib . && perjury install-test.js

author: AJ Jordan <alex@strugee.net>
